achievements: Billboard Music Awards Top Social Artist, multiple music show wins
additional_info: Part of the Love Yourself series, symbolizing youth and transformation
personal_feedback: A deeply emotional song that captures the essence of youth and change

lyrics.pronunciation: ba ra me na pul geo ri neun ggo nib cheo reum
lyrics.translation: Like a flower petal fluttering in the wind
lyrics.grammar: 꽃잎 (ggo nib) demonstrates complex Korean pronunciation rules
lyrics.background: This line metaphorically describes the delicate nature of youth

lyrics.translation: Every moment of you, like a flower petal
lyrics.background: Continuing the metaphor of fragile, beautiful moments
